sqlList.sql: select tlb.facilities_code AS FACILITIESCODE, tlb.name_zh AS FACILITIESNM, tlb.seq AS HTSEQ,tbf.facilities_type_seq AS TYPESEQ,tbf.facilities_type_name AS TYPENAME from t_lm_b_facilities tlb left join t_lm_b_facilities_type tbf on tlb.type=tbf.facilities_type_code order by tbf.facilities_type_seq asc, tlb.seq asc
select id, name_zh, name_en, TYPE, FACILITIES_CODE,status, SEQ,create_time, update_time from t_lm_b_facilities where id=:id
select id, facilities_type_code AS FtCode, facilities_type_name AS FtName, facilities_type_seq AS FtSeq, status AS FtStatus, create_time, update_time from t_lm_b_facilities_type where id=:ID
select facilities_type_code AS TYPECODE, facilities_type_name AS TYPENAME from t_lm_b_facilities_type order by FACILITIES_TYPE_SEQ asc
select NVL(max(SEQ), 0)+1 from T_LM_B_FACILITIES where TYPE=:TYPE
select SEQ from T_LM_B_FACILITIES where id=:ID AND TYPE=:TYPE
select NVL(max(facilities_type_seq), 0)+1 from t_lm_b_facilities_type

select tlb.ID, tlb.name_zh AS FACILITIESNM, tlb.FACILITIES_CODE AS FACILITIESCODE, (CASE tlb.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, tlb.create_time AS CDTIME , tlb.update_time AS UDTIME ,tlb.seq AS FTSEQ, tlb.type, tbf.facilities_type_name AS FTTYPENM from t_lm_b_facilities tlb left join t_lm_b_facilities_type tbf on tlb.type = tbf.facilities_type_code where (:TYPE IS NULL OR type=:TYPE) order by tlb.seq asc

select ID, name_zh AS FACILITIESNM, FACILITIES_CODE AS FACILITIESCODE, (CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, create_time AS CDTIME , update_time AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_facilities where type='S' order by id desc

select id AS FTID, facilities_type_code AS FTCODE, facilities_type_name AS FTNM, facilities_type_seq AS FTSEQ, (CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, create_time AS CDTIME, UPDATE_TIME AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_facilities_type order by facilities_type_seq asc

select ID, name_zh AS FACILITIESNM, FACILITIES_CODE AS FACILITIESCODE, (CASE status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, create_time AS CDTIME , update_time AS UDTIME from t_lm_b_facilities where type='F' order by id desc
select ID, name_zh from t_lm_b_facilities where name_zh = :CHKNAME and type=:TYPE
select ID from t_lm_b_facilities_type where facilities_type_name = :CHKNAME OR facilities_type_code=:CHKCODE

insert into t_lm_b_facilities_type (id, facilities_type_code, facilities_type_name, facilities_type_seq, status, create_time, update_time) values (:ID, :CODE, :NAMECN, TO_NUMBER(:SEQ), '0', sysdate, sysdate)
insert into t_lm_b_facilities (id, name_zh, type, status,FACILITIES_CODE,seq,create_time, update_time) values (:ID,:NAMECN, :TYPE, '1', :CODE,:SEQ,sysdate, sysdate)
update t_lm_b_facilities set name_zh=:NAMECN, status=:ONLINESTATUS, type=:TYPE, SEQ=:SEQ,update_time=sysdate where ID=:ID
update t_lm_b_facilities_type set FACILITIES_TYPE_NAME=:NAMECN, FACILITIES_TYPE_CODE=:CODE, status=:ONLINESTATUS, update_time=sysdate where ID=:ID
select ID, name_zh from t_lm_b_facilities where name_zh = :CHKNAME and type=:TYPE and ID<>:ID
select id from t_lm_b_facilities_type where (facilities_type_code=:CHKCODE OR facilities_type_name=:CHKNAME) AND id <> :ID
select id, facilities_code AS FACILITIESCODE, hotel_id, update_time from t_lm_b_facilities_hotel where hotel_id=:HOTELID and STATUS='1'
update t_lm_b_facilities_hotel set STATUS='0', update_time =sysdate where hotel_id=:HOTELID and STATUS='1'

merge into t_lm_b_facilities_hotel t1 using (select :HOTELID AS HOTEL_ID,:FACILITIESCODE AS FACILITIES_CODE from dual) t2 on (t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID and t1.FACILITIES_CODE = t2.FACILITIES_CODE) when matched then update set t1.status='1', t1.update_time=sysdate where t1.HOTEL_ID = t2.HOTEL_ID and t1.FACILITIES_CODE = t2.FACILITIES_CODE when not matched then insert values (t_lm_b_facilities_hotel_SEQ.nextval, t2.FACILITIES_CODE,t2.HOTEL_ID,'1',sysdate,sysdate)
update t_lm_b_facilities_type set facilities_type_seq=TO_NUMBER(:SEQ), update_time =sysdate where id=:ID
update t_lm_b_facilities set seq=TO_NUMBER(:SEQ), update_time =sysdate where id=:ID
